directions: Stir apples, orange zest and juice, cinnamon, brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and Cointreau in a large pitcher to combine. Let sit at room temperature for 1 hour. DO AHEAD: Sangria base can be made 1 day ahead. Cover; chill.
Add wine to sangria base and stir to combine. Pour sangria over ice, top off with club soda, and garnish with orange slices.
ingredients: 2 green apples (such as Granny Smith), cored, cut into 3/4" pieces
Zest of 1 orange, removed in long strips with a vegetable peeler
1/4 cup Cointreau or other orange liqueur
title: Green Apple Sangria
